bio: A Void is a DIY 3 piece rock band carried by french force of nature Camille Alexander on guitar and vocals. The band formed in Paris before seeking exile in London, UK and has since been spreading their chaos all over the country as well as Germany and the Netherlands. The band has self-released 2 albums, ”Awkward & Devastated” and ”Dissociation”. The latter received national radio plays on Radio X, Radio fm4 (Austria), Ouï FM and RTL2 (france) as well as being featured on Rolling Stone France and Notion UK. The band is known for their strong DIY ethos, from the releases to the music videos. A VOID have performed shows for a variety of emblematic live music venues in the UK, France and Germany including Concorde 2, the Cavern Club, The Dome, Belgrave Music Hall, Molotow Club and have shared stages with Lambrini Girls, Sorry, Calva Louise, The Wytches, Skating Polly, and Hands Off Gretel (now Delilah Bon) amongst many others. The band win over new converts at every show they perform and have built up a significant social media presence. They are currently recording their 3rd album with Mercury Prize winning producer Shuta Shinoda.
name: A Void

bio: Brighton based alt-pop artist aakira fae crafts dreamy, ethereal soundscapes with emotive storytelling at their core. Described as a "literal singing fairy," she draws inspiration from artists like Biig Piig, Billie Eilish, and Arlo Parks, blending hazy production with raw, heartfelt lyricism. Her debut single "butterflies" (2024) introduced her intoxicating blend of alt-pop and neo-soul, followed by "upstate" and "overrated," which explore themes of love, longing, and chaos. Collaborating closely with producer Alex Collins, aakira fae continues to get stuck in your head with her dreamy vocals and poetic honesty. Having performed all over Brighton and at festivals like Secret Garden Party, aakira's infectious energy on stage is not to be missed.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6H6eylunylmvqQ46TfVhAE?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: aakira fae

bio: Almahata is the independent alternative/folk project of Folkestone based singer/songwriter, Phoebe Warden. With the name loosely translating to ‘the souls natural sound’, the music of Almahata is reminiscent of 60s/70’s folk heroines, Sandy Denny and Joni Mitchell. Steeped in confronting truths, the songwriting is introspective and an ode to seeking connection and authenticity within the confines of the modern day world.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/7AkgwZdG90bmC88BJGef2I?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Almahata

bio: Hailing from the Australian country music scene, BetiFya is a country artist who writes raw, heartfelt songs that read like stories from the past Blending honest, emotional lyrics with upbeat, danceable melodies, they bring light and energy to even the darkest themes With a style that’s both vulnerable and uplifting, BetiFya creates country music made to move, heal, and connect Let’s get ready to Stop Rock and Yodel yall!
name: BetiFya

bio: From the deep recesses of the internet: BIG TROUSERS, the brand new, suit-donning two-piece bringing their genre-defining post-post-punk sound to the scrolling masses. The pair use their growing platform to satirise societal issues facing today's youth, such as discount clothing stores' (alleged) insidious tax practices, big oil’s transport monopoly, and the existential dread developed through overexposure to deep-fried internet content.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/316hBqEkOfIJ4EaOGiIle9?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Big trousers

bio: Black Bordello is a London-based, 5-piece art-rock band fronted by Sienna Bordello (lead vocals, guitar), known for their theatrical live performances, genre-defying sound, and experimental DIY ethos. Formed in Peckham in 2017, the band explores themes of the metaphysical and outer space in their music, as seen in their debut album Black Bordello (2020) and the later album White Bardo (2024). They have built a name for themselves on the London live circuit, including regular shows at cult venues The Windmill and the George Tavern, and notable appearances at festivals such as UK’s Bestival, NYC’s New Colossus, and Rotterdam’s Left of The Dial.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0LhmtJ38vRhd35Eg3oC1nt?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Black Bordello

bio: Coder are a four-piece indie/shoegaze band based across the coastal towns of Folkestone, Margate and Hastings. Their sound blends reverb-heavy guitars, submerged vocals and atmospheric textures drawing on influences like My Bloody Valentine, Cocteau Twins and Interpol.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/51faPPKFQ9vkBSajfIbN0g?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Coder

bio: Forming in Brighton, Currls are a DIY Garage Rock trio that burst onto the scene in 2017 and have since become a formidable presence in the underground music scene. Seamlessly blending raw Garage rock, fast-paced Punk, and sludgy Pop, Currls is a sonic powerhouse that will leave you feeling ready to take on the world.  Since their inception, Currls have gained notable support from BBC 6 Music’s Amy Lamè, Marc Riley, Steve Lamcaq, BBC Radio 1’s Alyx Holcombe and BBC Introducing’s Melita Dennett, whilst also receiving worldwide radio play.  Recent triumphs include winning Record Store Day's 'Unsigned 2023' competition, Their US Debut featuring on New Colossus Festival 2024 and also invited to perform on the British Music Embassy Stage SXSW 2024, recording a 'BBC Introducing Live Session' at Maida Vale Studios, and a 'BBC 6 Music: Live In Session' with Marc Riley. The band also secured a spot on ‘Glastonbury Festival's Emerging Talent longlist’ in 2025 and 2022.  In a world saturated with conformity, Currls stands as a beacon of authenticity - A trio that defies expectations and leaves an everlasting imprint on the hearts of those who dare to listen.
name: CURRLS

bio: DANAMA’s music is like a vibrant celebration of her mental health journey, turning the struggles into something empowering and full of light! She loves to sprinkle little secret messages into her songs – what you hear on the surface might sound one way, but to her, it could be a whole different vibe, layered with meaning. It’s all about growth, progress, and shining through it all!
embedString: <iframe data-testid="embed-iframe" style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5kjg1V3FLw9FHcFKW5NaG3?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
name: DANAMA

bio: Dear Pariah is a musician featured on 6Music, reviewed 9/10 by Line of Best Fit & showcased earlier this year live by ‘Eat Your Own Ears Recommends’. In the past year she’s created her first short film with Director Garath Whyte, using the spoken word piece on the B side to her single KOKO (released on Trapped Animal Records). ‘TANK’ has just premiered at Raindance, been nominated for 7 awards at Greenwich Film Festival and will soon be screened at BAFTA & BIFA accredited Aesthetica. Her work focuses heavily on her experience living with a life threatening condition.
embedString: <iframe data-testid="embed-iframe" style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/7CkSQwEhMKpiutmEeNBL6X?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
name: Dear Pariah

bio: Delicia is a four piece indie rock band based in Kent, comprising of Hannah, Dan, Alex and Callum. With five strong singles under their belt, they’re currently crafting their next release. Their sound ranges from high energy rock tracks to slow power ballads, with emotive lyrics that touch upon situations that are relatable to many people in their day to day life. Known for their infectious melodies and energetic performances, Delicia promises to leave a memorable mark on the music scene with their unwavering passion and captivating sound.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5wX0USLsSaSm1b6TdOscqu?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Delicia

bio: “DIET JESUS” are an irreverent, egotistical rock and roll band from Ramsgate, formed in 2024.  Inspired by The Sonics, Courtney Taylor-Taylor, and early Blur, expect catchy pop melodies, incredibly annoying hooks and self-centred swagger from frontman Joshua John Parker backed up by the immense Henry Gabbott, Lo Barnes and Elias Gargallo.
embedString: DIET JESUS · DIET JESUS (SECRET DEMOS)
name: DIET JESUS

bio: Dread FM, the genre-bending solo artist known for his distinct fusion of heavy rock and alternative hip-hop, with major support from Radio 6 & Radio X. The brainchild of West Sussex-based Flynn Murray, Dread FM’s studio recordings and live performances are distinguished by heavy FX bass, dynamic riffs and lyricism.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2RZfTSqCyQlZB1jRTA7Wzd?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Dread FM

bio: Eneeks birthplace of London city continues to inspire his music today. Growing up as the youngest of 4 brothers in a West-Indian household, the sounds of Soul, Rare Grove, Reggae and Jazz often filled his home. His brothers then introduced him to Hiphop music and Eneeks instantly became a fan. Officially arriving onto the scene with mixtapes that announced his musical talents to the wider world. While continuing to release a series of underground projects Eneeks also started to perform and record with a live band, reconnecting his lyrics with that soulful jazz sound. From his first recorded live EP ‘Dreammaker’ Eneeks quickly gained attention from MTV and BBC radio, and signed to an independent label called Tokyo Dawn Records to release his next EP 'My Queen, My King, My God’. Through this project Eneeks gained notoriety and started to tour in India, France and Spain. Eneeks has now released his new album G.I.N.A (God Is Never Absent). The insightful artist has created a wonderful mix of Hiphop, Jazz and Neo Soul, including features from Omar, Raheem DeVaughn and many more. With his incredible new album Eneeks is blazing the trail for the new era of Hiphop, Jazz and Soul.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/5LPTbQUZdHUanFJ4MNxmaC?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Eneeks

bio: ¡Escucha! a hardcore punk band hailing from a Folkestone before. Formed by Jacques Collins originally from Deadlife portrait and Breakneck in 2001, gathered members who are influenced by bands like God speed, Jr Ewing, refused and At the drive in bring an Almighty shudder of roaring soundscapes and destructive raw guitars with explosive live performances. Originally signed to Big scary monster released a 4 track EP along with a long career spanning over 20 years. We are now dragging this shattered donkey kicking and screaming into 2025, ready to take on anything in its path. Get ready to see an act like you've never seen before.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4Jo0AsVKiEPzzjK4cNHBfA?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Escucha

bio: Estelle Mey weaves voice and hurdy-gurdy into a collision of sound, blending folk’s earthy soul, punk’s raw fire, and the textures of experimental electronics. Her music moves through primal rhythms and fragile tones, sometimes venturing into ancient tongues or subtle sonic experiments like translating plant signals into sound. Elemental, immersive, and fiercely alive. Born in Ardèche, France, Estelle’s musical journey began in Iceland, immersed in raw, powerful sounds. Now based in Kent, UK, she channels the fierce energy of punk while her music pulses with earthy, instinctive textures such as hand drums and primal instruments. Solo or with a band, her live performance is a visceral, unfiltered, and powerful experience. Calling to fans of Eivør, Heilung, Warduna, Björk, Nine Inch Nails, and Sepultura. ”So punky, I just like that old school raw punk, I'm all about it! ” - Alyx Holcombe, BBC RADIO 1
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1LZfH4FtphjIcvBTlVNk5h?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Estelle Mey

bio: “Fever Rouge Are in a lane of their own” - CLASH. “Blends post-punk, indie, and alt-rock with gritty energy” - It’s Psychedelic Baby Magazine. The Brighton outfit Fever Rouge have built a glowing reputation for their high octane live shows with a string of sold-out headline shows. Drawing influences from the likes of King Krule, Radiohead, Bloc Party and The Stone Roses in a modern twist with introspective lyrics and unbridled energy which has seen the band quickly build a following across the UK.  The band consists of vocalist, guitarist and songwriter Ollie Hughes, bass enthusiast Alain De Gouveia and the ‘how is he human’ metronome Oli Mooney and the royalty that is Kieran King on guitar.  Having garnered support across the likes of Earmilk, It’s Psychedelic Baby Magazine, Ones To Watch, Notion and Amazing Radio following the release of their new EP the hedonistic, twisting ‘Feed The Villain’, Fever Rouge have toured the UK in April 2025 including stand out sets atThe Alternative Escape and are set to play Summer By the River festival (London) and Wilderness after securing a slot at Pub in the Park in 2024. The band have opened for the likes of The Molotovs, Pleasure Inc, Mouth Culture, Die Twice, Humane the Moon, Cannes Pineapple and McFly to name just a few.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/track/0w1sJFp3kiXRzpRSsi8viD?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Fever Rouge

bio: The Genre bending band FirePony are back air kicking maximalist instrumental rock with synthwave influences and nods to 80s nostalgia, you can guarantee peak glam core experience. With stunning visuals and artistic flair. Proud to be apart of the MumDad records rosta, the Pony comes forth with its unique blend of jangly riffs, luscious synths and brown corded trousers.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/6C7Wknh2UAZtHJEUqKCF8W?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: FirePony

bio: Formed in early 2022, Fruit Band is a one piece pop rock band based in Margate. The band comprised of sole memberJames Gale has started to gain a reputation as one of the most fun live musical acts in the east of Kent. From 2022s pop rock epic ‘Munching the Fruits of Love’ to the brand new album comprised of two near 15 minute long songs ‘B-Sides,’ each song sounds completely different to the last. Having supported the likes of Cardinals, Charles Moothart, Jack Goldstein, and a recently announced show at smugglers. 2025 is shaping up to be a special year for Fruit Band and their label ‘Fabulous Things!’
name: Fruit Band

bio: grassmell is a folkestone-based alternative artist crafting a raw, immersive blend of alt-pop, shoegaze, and grunge. active since 2023, grassmell is a solo act with a big sound — think dreamy distortion meets emotional punch. far from a typical one-man show, live performances feature a mannequin companion and a stage presence that hits hard. writing and producing every track himself, grassmell brings a distinct, DIY energy to everything he creates. with a debut album set for release in 2025, he’s currently seeking venues that are ready to host something different — loud, heartfelt, and unforgettable.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1iUDezGXoWSjSuUgJnjrlx?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: grassmell

bio: Greenness is the project of French singer-songwriter Cécile Frangi and English producer, composer and guitarist Graham Pratt.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/16vwI48VXLvYiU6kyIaWCe?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Greenness

bio: HONEYBUZZARD are a Kent based alternative rock band, drawing influence from grunge, psychedelic rock, shoegaze and indie. Formed in 2023, they have gathered a loyal cult following with their intense live performances. Described by PitJunkie as a band ‘with a tendency to take you on an audio-spiritual journey’ and BBC Introducing’s Abbie McCarthy as ‘quite simply phenomenal’, HONEYBUZZARD are rapidly snowballing into a band that can’t be ignored.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2tNYC7e6Kgnz0ShLejEhST?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: HONEYBUZZARD

bio: I am HER is Julie Riley (formerly of 90s cult band Rosa Mota  with drummer Jeff Townsin (Submarine, Madam, Sophia). They bring alt/punk stories peppered with some contrasting contemplative moments and a touch of pop. ‘Riley is at her intense and punky best when she sounds like PJ Harvey, as on the dark, gothic waltz “Debby Brown” ‘. - Uncut Magazine 'Debby Brown kicks up a wonderful original noise with just the two of you. A fine modern take on the murder ballad’. - Tom Robinson
name: I am HER

bio: WE ARE IO! We are an all female four piece alternative/punk rock band based in Kent. Inspired by both our childhood music and classic artists across time, we merge the two worlds in a clash of alternative Y2K feminist punk rock. Think Britney... with tasty guitar licks, gut-busting drums, and a dash of female rage! We just wanna bring you a good time. Lose your inhibitions and live out your childhood dreams, come dance with us and be who you truly are. Our music is all about telling it how it is, with a little bit of humour and a lotta awesome sound. Ellis, the green eyed-renegade, is our lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist. Lucy is our voodoo vixen killer lead guitarist and backing vocals. Ella is our supreme bass queen. Katrina is our fierce whirlwind drummer. Together we are girl band IO!
name: IO

bio: Joe Bulley is a songwriter, producer, and composer who, over the past 15 years, has written, recorded, and performed with a wide range of artists and bands across the UK. In 2024, he released three strikingly varied singles — “Disco Kid,” “Chatter Box,” and “Come Baby Burn” — each exploring different corners of his eclectic sound, from jagged indie rock to brooding electronic textures.  Now based in Folkestone, Kent, Joe operates out of his home studio, where he is currently finishing work on his debut solo record. On May 9th he released his 4th single ”Ugly Boy”. The accompanying music video was shot at the Folkestone Quarterhouse when Joe and his band supported the Rifles on their nationwide tour. Joe's next single is ”It's In the Bag”, and will be out June 20th. Originally from London, Joe draws deeply from an array of influences, blending the raw energy of Queens of the Stone Age and Fat Dog, the cinematic depth of Radiohead and Nick Cave, and the offbeat charm of Mac DeMarco and Tom Waits. His sound sits at the intersection of Alternative Rock, Indie, and Electronica, underscoring lyrics that are introspective, darkly humorous, and sometimes surreal.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2exaTKBWY6zmWbFzLCPPGK?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Joe Bulley

bio: Longfall are a female-fronted art-rock band that weave together several genres with ample quirk and punch, bringing something different into the musical space.We were formed by singer & pianist Alise under the name ”The Bearing” with our sound developing with the addition of guitarist Dan, bass player Dave and then drummer Richard in 2024.
name: Longfall

bio: Lucy May Walker is a Singer/Songwriter based in Folkestone, Kent. Lucy May began her career busking on the streets of London where she was discovered by Jeremy Vine who then invited her onto both his BBC Radio 2 & TV Talk shows. Lucy has supported the likes of Texas, Wet Wet Wet & Lucy Spraggan as well as selling out numerous shows of her own across the UK. She hosts ‘Lucy May Walker’s Writer’s Round’ in Folkestone which regularly sells out.
embedString: <iframe data-testid="embed-iframe" style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/4GiM6Vc8u1qayXEAEdxPlS?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
name: Lucy May Walker

bio: London-born and Margate-based, Meg Bird is a singer-songwriter known for her emotionally rich songwriting, soulful voice, and whimsical lyricism. Blending jazz harmony with contemporary songwriting, Meg explores complex themes with warmth, humour, and depth. Her music is equally at home in jazz clubs and grassroots venues. Whether accompanied by a full rhythm section or playing solo on keys, Meg’s performances are immersive and story-driven, shaped by her background in jazz and her love of language. A first-class graduate of the Guildhall School of Music, Meg released her debut album Girls Like Lions in 2021, earning praise and airplay on BBC Radio 3 and Jazz FM. In 2024, she followed with a series of singles titled Of Hope, showcasing her ever-evolving sound and artistry.
name: Meg Bird

bio: Mitchell Lane are an indie rock group from the Medway Towns, playing pop melodies over brash guitars, soundscape synths and garage rock rhythms.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/01VhijI4nSfldzr4ewcNkK?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Mitchell Lane

bio: Moon Hooligan are a friendly bunch of psychedelic cowboys and sonic adventurers making good old fashioned rock’n’roll. From electronic wig-outs to Neil Young-esque ballads – their music is as timeless as their tongue-in-cheek lyrics; a fun band for nice people.
name: Moon Hooligan

bio: Moss.E is a rising talent based in Kent, England, whose music blends the emotive storytelling of folk with an alternative, gritty edge. Selected as part of the emerging artists program 2024 at Pie Factory Music, and tonetic records artist program 2025, Moss.E is gaining recognition for her dynamic sound and introspective lyrics, which invite listeners into a world of both light and dark. Her musical influences range from the haunting melodies of Billie Eilish and AURORA to the profound Lyricism of NF and Ren to the unique artistry of Kiki Rockwell and Paris Paloma. Having honed her craft through busking and performing at Events such as Into the Wild Festival, Moss.E's live shows are a testament to her ability to connect with audiences on a deep, personal level. Whether covering familiar tracks or unveiling her own original work, she captures the essence of vulnerability and strength with each performance. Currently working on her debut EP, Moss.E is poised to make her mark as a songwriter and musician whose sound is both timeless and innovative.
name: Moss.E

bio: A pizza eating weasel and/or a band. A group of guys making music like it is still 1996.
name: Pizza Weasel

bio: Polite Bureaux formed in Bradford. Broken beat-maker & bass guitarist Joseph Smith set up the band; and after selling music gear to pay for a night of drinking in Brighton, dyslexic Smith started writing a song in the pub that night, on a gas bill envelope - coining the phase ‘Except Your Skint’, which later became the title of his studio album. Polite Bureaux is a high-energy electronic post-punk band known for sharp commentary on modern life. Polite Bureaux is a blistering shot of raw commentary, cutting through the noise with jagged rhythms, booming basslines, and a lyrical style that’s as incisive as it is unapologetic. With live bass, drums, and a fierce vocal presence, they create a visceral soundscape that resonates deeply with audiences. Hailing from the UK’s DIY scene, Joe is joined live on stage by his sister Maya and their friend Viv - they’ve secured a reputation for high-energy performances that blur the lines between rave and protest.
genre: Electronic Music (Performed Live! Think dance, electronica, disco, trip-hop, synth-pop etc.)
name: Polite Bureaux

bio: Conjuring an introspective, hypnotic swirl of grunge-infused shoegaze and haunting alt-rock, Poppy Rockett draws comparisons to early Radiohead and Hope Sandoval through powerful guitar and melancholic melodies.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/2WtdUdDkpWNrNQ19yFm1NY?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Poppy Rockett

bio: Punching Swans may be called the ‘nicest guys in rock’ but they’re also rebels at heart with a devoted following and a hard-won reputation as hardcore’s harbingers of the ‘What-if?’ It’s math rock mayhem meets noise punk nirvana. A Kafka vs. Cthulhu love story set to a soundscape of David Lynch surrealism. They’ll turn your existential dread  into a party.  Pablo Paganotto (Sassyhiya, Mookherjee), Greg Webster (Sonaura) and Joe Wise (Frau Pouch) have been crafting sonic architecture for the disaffected South England set for years. A polyamorous marriage of technical brilliance, catchy complexity and unadulterated energy, these London/Kent scene veterans deliver. As individuals they’ve been instrumental in cultivating DIY networks for performance and amplifying quieter creative voices. As a band, Punching Swans are prolific, proficient and always ready to release the next colossal Kraken.
name: Punching Swans

bio: We are a brighton based two piece, we’ve toured nationally for the last five years, supporting bands like Martha, tigers jaw, one step closer and Muncie girls. Just self released our second album on vinyl, which received international, overall positive coverage.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/21yNeFuZ01tzQBPw02CSBl?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Regal Cheer

bio: Deep, poetic and rapid-fire rap delivered over sometimes soulful, sometimes indie but always groovy acoustic guitar with heartfelt delivery. These are the chronicles of how a regular boy was twisted over decades and became one of the most celebrated, most notorious, and most misunderstood phenomena’s in this arm of the galaxy. Star Trash wasn’t always the engine of demonic chaos he is today—he was simply the wrong man in the right place, desperate to find meaning in a universe that was, apparently, devoid of a plan. A rare celestial event would push Aaron ‘Face’ Taylor beyond this realm, imbuing him with the ability to tap into the raw material that is the true source of all things in the universe: pure chaos. Were he more deserving, he could have used this power for good, but Aaron was tainted—a flawed product of his life experience. Rejected by his elders, despised by peers, betrayed by those closest to him and stepped on by the society he tried to call home, the chaos embedded itself on the dark seeds of his soul and began to spread…
name: Star Trash

bio: Margate-based power trio The Echograms craft expansive sonic atmospheres with introspective and deeply honest lyrics. Once the solo project of guitarist Claire Pitt Wigmore, the band has honed their bluegaze sound and dynamic stage presence into an unmissable live experience.
embedString: <iframe data-testid="embed-iframe" style="border-radius:12px" src="https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/1Dcpeq9yt47VLpcqm8XQ7C?utm_source=generator" width="100%" height="352" frameBorder="0" allowfullscreen="" allow="autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" loading="lazy"></iframe>
name: The Echograms

bio: The King Rooks, from Folkestone in Kent are a combination of big riffs, catchy melodies and huge choruses. Since forming 5 years ago, the band have released 3 singles, followed up by a 3-track EP and their 5 most recent single releases will all be included on their debut album release, 'Do It Anyway' which will be out on July 4th! For fans of Alternative Rock, Indie Rock and Post-Punk.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/0q4FgR2bd15nODob6mJPIA?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: The King Rooks

bio: She recently opened for The Last Dinner Party at their biggest headline show to date, has been championed by BBC 6, DIY, CLASH, NME, Apple Music and CHANEL: you may not know her name yet, but Vanity Fairy seems destined to transcend her underground cult status.   Between her shimmering vocal falsetto (which has been compared to everyone from Barry Gibb to Kate Bush) and onstage theatrics, the iconic disco darling is earning a reputation as one of the most mesmerising live performers around.   Following support slots for The Last Dinner Party, Get Down Services, Electric Six, Warmduscher, Katy J Pearson, Lime Garden, Pip Blom and more, Fairy dropped her sophomore EP ‘Top of the Pops’ on Moshi Moshi records April 2024.   The EP spins a nostalgia-laden world that plays with kitsch-pop tropes and revels in the hedonistic indulgences of classic disco. But there’s also something strange at work here. Far from content to ape her be-dazzled Studio 54 idols, Fairy adds something new to the mix. It’s a bittersweet, playful, wistful sensibility that works itself out in a sound that both reveres and toys with the music she loves with all her heart.    Though she sparkles on record, Vanity Fairy is undeniably best experienced live.  ‘A spectacle in the truest sense of the word, her show spans high camp theatrics, 80’s indebted synth-pop and sultry disco bangers… unavoidably infectious and utterly joy inducing’ - DIY.
name: Vanity Fairy

bio: Hi I’m Will Rees, a song writer and producer living in Margate. I was a founding member of Mystery Jets, touring and releasing albums between 2005 and 2019, then since 2019 I’ve been focusing on a solo album, have relocated to Margate, set up the monthly Song Salon music night as well as co-writing and gigging alongside many of the amazing musicians I’ve met since moving here. A little bit about the Song Salon… it’s a music night/hub for artists to meet and share their works in progress, starting back in 2021 at the Tom Thumb, it runs on the last Thursday of every month and invites and encourages music makers of all description to share what they’re working on, stuck on, unable to finish or are buzzing and excited about. It’s been a great incentive for me to have a new song written every month and it’s been really cool to see collaboration formed from people who have met at the night, bands, albums, songs, have all been born out of the connections formed at the Salon…as I’m sure you’ll agree it’s testament to the wealth of artistic talent we have around these parts. How about a Song Salon in Folkestone ?!
name: Will Rees

bio: With an intoxicating blend of shimmering synths, rich piano textures, atmospheric pads, and the celestial dual harmonies of Ananda Howard and Jasmine Ardley, Winter Gardens craft a sonic experience that feels both otherworldly and deeply personal. Their music traverses a vivid spectrum of styles—an eclectic tapestry of ethereal shoegaze, driving post-punk energy, and a brooding gothic undertone. At its core lies a powerful sense of emotional depth, with lyrics that evoke a haunting, cryptic intimacy, wrapping listeners in a kaleidoscopic dreamscape of sound.  Since their inception, Winter Gardens have steadily built a reputation for their distinctive sound and captivating live performances, sharing stages with iconic acts such as Echo & The Bunnymen, Gary Numan, Modern English, Piroshka, and Pale Blue Eyes. They've become a staple on the UK festival circuit, including a standout performance at Rockaway Beach 2024 alongside OMD, Self Esteem, and Peter Hook & The Light.  This year marks an exciting evolution for the band, with the formation of a bold new lineup bringing renewed creative confidence. 2024 has seen Winter Gardens venture beyond UK borders, performing across Europe at acclaimed festivals like Left Of The Dial and Supersonic. Their rising profile has been matched by increasing radio support, including airplay on BBC Radio 1, BBC Introducing, and Seattle’s influential KEXP.
name: Winter Gardens

bio: Wolfe Sunday is a south coast based acoustic act with an energetic performance style, fun songs and bringing a punk twist to the usual singer/songwriter style. Having been active since 2013, Wolfe Sunday spent most of the last decade bringing his unique show to every bar, pub, basement and house show that would have him. Despite playing London's MCM Comic Con and Alexandra Palace for London's Tattoo Convention, his favourite show was playing on an old mattress that was the 'outside stage' of a festival once.
name: Wolfe Sunday

bio: Yesterday’s Flowers make dreamy cosmic rock that basks in the golden glow of the early 60s California Sound – via their seaside home of Folkestone on the English Channel. With shimmers of ethereal psychedelia, expect nostalgic chords, swelling organ and sun-drenched melodies; all served on a mesmeric rhythm section. Since releasing their first three singles in 2023, the band have played sold-out shows from Folkestone to Liverpool, including a joint headliner with Congratulations (Bella Union) and SKIES at Folkestone's Quarterhouse, a support slot for Austin noise-pop band, DAIISTAR (Fuzz Club) and their own headline EP release at St Mary and St Eanswythe's Church, which saw them awarded Arts Council England funding. Early radio support has come from BBC Radio 6 Music (The Huey Show) and BBC Music Introducing, as well as local stations from Folkestone to Montréal. The band's debut EP There's Only Love was released on Friday 13 December 2024, accompanied by a limited edition cassette which features an exclusive side of unreleased acoustic versions.
embedString: <iframe style='border-radius:12px' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/artist/547EZZXpLRkGkDP00t7WcQ?utm_source=generator' width='100%' height='352' frameBorder='0' allowfullscreen='' allow='autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; fullscreen; picture-in-picture' loading='lazy'></iframe>
name: Yesterday’s Flowers

bio: We are the Zombie Killers. Our live shows have been described as bedlam, chaos, insanity, mind blowing, energetic and insane. We're a high energy, female fronted punk band led by our singer Oceanne who also plays the flute. Our original songs cover every shade and flavour of music from all across the punk genre from Thrash and Hardcore to Ska and Punk Rock. Band members are from Folkestone and the surrounding areas Tom - Guitar, Charlie - Bass, James - Drums, Oceanne - Vocals/Flute.
name: Zombie Killers
